content.first: Use the map to find and share the free resources available in your local area. showers. food. shelter. washing machines. support groups
content.second: You are surrounded by kind people nearby who want to support you building a happier life. Their kind 'community offers' can be found on the map
content.third: Please don't use the map to ask for money, its not how the map works and so anyone who does will be banned. This is a space for people who want to support you in other ways
content.fourth: People will help, but only you can change your life. Focus on one small thing to improve for a while, and as it gets better take another step, step by step towards the life you want to live. Keep going and it will get better

content.first: Post free resources you find onto the map. suit hire for interviews. shelters or religious buildings offering showers. support groups. pass it on coffee. where to find free food
content.second: The helpless feeling of walking past people who are sleeping on the streets, wanting to help but not knowing what you can do. That changes today!
content.third: Browse suggestions for things you can offer on the map to support people struggling nearby, like;
content.fourth: CV/resume building help. Teach a skill. An intro, old books and advice on starting in your profession. Or simply a cup of tea, or a meal to share a friendly chat and some normality
content.fifth: Print the map as a valuable guide to give those on the streets, helping them access resources to improve and change their situation
